description: Reserved Matters Application for layout, scale, appearance of the buildings, and the landscaping of the proposal for 75 dwellings, 102 parking spaces and public open space pursuant to Outline Planning Permission 00143/A/P50 granted on 30/03/2012.(for the Extension of time for implementation of extant planning permission: 00143/A/P45 which was granted on 30 March 2006 with a legal agreement (being for Variation of condition 3 (approval of reserved matters within 3 years) of date of permission 00143/A/P42 dated 11/4/2005), to allow for the extension of time limit to 6 years. (Outline application (Access Only) for the demolition of the existing stadium, the erection of residential development and creation of open space)
